attributes.review: As a 50 year old white woman from the Midwest I was really excited to download this app. Unfortunately, I was unable to use it without the assistance of my ungrateful lazy children who refused to help me. I spent 5 hours trying to download it. Can you make this app easier to use for those with low IQs? I feel like this app may have actual been made by the DEmOCrAtEs to sell the information of loyal trump supporters to China.
attributes.title: Wanted to like it

attributes.review: STOLE ALL MY INFO, TALKED CRAP ABOUT PEOPLE DO NOT GET IT

attributes.review: Complete trash🐐. Unbelievable that Trump can’t get an app to work properly. Wow. So so bad.

attributes.review: The app is literally so bad when I installed it gave my phone a virus.🤮🤮🤮 I started getting spam phone calls saying I’m Donald Trump vote me for president, if I could I would rate this app 0 stars

attributes.review: Deleted as soon as I read through the privacy policy. Tracking, beacons, if you opt out the app won’t fully work, etc. do not use this app.
attributes.title: Privacy Policy Nightmare!
